What Is an Old Facebook Account?

An old Facebook account (or aged Facebook account) is simply a Facebook profile that has been active for a long period of time—usually months or even years. These accounts have established credibility with Facebook’s algorithms and are much less likely to face restrictions compared to new accounts.

Key Features of Old Facebook Accounts

Here are some of the standout features that make aged accounts valuable:

  • Age: Accounts are typically 1–5+ years old, making them trusted by Facebook’s algorithms.

  • Activity: Older accounts often have a history of posts, likes, and engagement, which adds to their credibility.

  • Verification: Verified with real email addresses and phone numbers for added security.

  • Marketplace Access: Many aged accounts come with immediate access to Facebook Marketplace.

  • Advertising Readiness: These accounts are ready to run ad campaigns without the delays or restrictions often faced by new accounts.

Why Are Old Facebook Accounts Important?

If you’ve ever tried starting fresh with a new account for ads or business purposes, you’ve likely faced roadblocks like ad rejections, restricted features, or even outright bans. Old accounts solve these issues and provide several key benefits:

1. Faster Results

New accounts often need time to build trust with Facebook’s system. They may experience delays in ad approvals or feature access. With aged accounts, you skip this waiting period and can start running ads or accessing Marketplace features immediately.

2. Safer Solutions

Old accounts are less likely to trigger Facebook’s security measures. These accounts have already passed Facebook’s trust-building process and therefore offer a more stable, reliable experience.

3. Scalability for Marketing

For businesses or marketers managing multiple campaigns, buying Facebook accounts in bulk allows you to scale your operations efficiently. You can target different demographics with multiple accounts without worrying about hitting limits.

4. Marketplace Access

Facebook Marketplace is one of the platform’s most valuable tools for buying and selling locally. Many new accounts don’t have Marketplace access, but aged accounts often come with this feature enabled.

Yes, as long as you purchase from a trusted provider like EverSMM. Our accounts are verified, secure, and come with guaranteed quality.

item.title: 백준 [1546]
item.content:encoded:
[문제 분석]

시험친 과목의 개수 $N$을 입력받습니다. 각 과목의 점수 중 최댓값 $M$을 찾습니다. 모든 점수를 점수 / M * 100으로 수정합니다. 수정된 점수들의 새로운 평균을 구합니다.

#include <algorithm>
        #include<iostream>
        #include <iomanip>
        
        using namespace std;
        
        int main()
        {   //50+100 +75 / 3 = 75.0
        int n;
        float m[1000], max= 0, sum = 0;
        cin>> n;
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
        {
        cin >> m[i];
        max = std::max(m[i], max);
        }
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
        {
        sum += m[i]/max*100;
        }
        
        float result = sum / n;
        cout << fixed << setprecision(2) << result;
        }

[특이사항]

  • <algorithm> 라이브러리의 max 함수 활용 기존에는 if문을 사용하여 수동으로 최댓값을 비교해 저장했지만, 이번에는 std::max() 함수를 사용하여 코드를 더 간결하게 작성했습니다.

  • 처음에는 점수(max, sum)를 int형으로 선언했습니다. 하지만 이 경우 점수 / max 과정에서 소수점 아래 숫자가 버려지는 정수 나눗셈 문제가 발생하여 정확한 평균값을 구할 수 없었습니다.

    해결책: 점수와 합계 변수를 float 형으로 선언하여 소수점 연산이 가능하도록 수정했습니다.

  • 결과값의 오차 범위를 맞추기 위해 <iomanip>의 setprecision 함수를 사용하여 소수점 자릿수를 고정해 보았습니다.

    cout << fixed << setprecision(2); : 소수점 둘째 자리까지 고정 출력.

하지만 이 문제의 경우 절대/상대 오차 허용 범위가 넓어 기본 cout 출력만으로도 통과가 가능했습니다.

#include <algorithm>
        #include<iostream>
        
        using namespace std;
        
        int main()
        {   
        int n;
        float m[1000], max= 0, sum = 0;
        cin>> n;
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
        {
        cin >> m[i];
        max = std::max(m[i], max);
        }
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
        {
        sum += m[i]/max*100;
        }
        
        float result = sum / n;
        cout << result;
        }

Furthermore, before finalizing any purchase, thoroughly research the seller’s background and verify their identity. Look for any red flags or suspicious activities that may indicate potential risks.

How Can I Get My Binance Account Verified? Getting your Binance account verified is an important step to ensure the security and legitimacy of your account. By completing the verification process, you not only gain access to additional features and higher withdrawal limits but also enhance the overall safety of your funds and transactions.

To get your Binance account verified, follow these simple steps: ➤ Log in to your Binance account: Visit the official Binance website or open the Binance app and log in using your credentials.

➤ Navigate to the verification section: Once logged in, locate and click on the “Account” or “Profile” tab. From there, find the “Verification” or “Identity Verification” option.

➤ Provide accurate personal information: Fill in all required fields with accurate personal information as requested by Binance. This typically includes details such as your full name, date of birth, residential address, and more.

➤ Upload supporting documents: Prepare scanned copies or clear photos of valid identification documents such as a passport or driver’s license. Follow Binance’s guidelines for document quality and format while uploading them securely onto their platform.

➤ Complete facial verification (if required): In some cases, you may be asked to complete a facial verification process using a webcam or by uploading a selfie. Follow the instructions provided by Binance carefully to ensure successful completion.

➤ Submit for review: Once you have filled in all necessary information and uploaded the required documents, review everything for accuracy before submitting your application for review.

➤ Wait for approval: The verification process may take some time as it involves manual review by Binance’s team members who ensure compliance with their policies and regulations. Be patient during this stage and check regularly for any updates on your account status.

Remember that each user’s verification experience may vary depending on factors such as location, document authenticity, and overall demand at that time. If you encounter any difficulties during the process, reach out to Binance’s customer support for prompt assistance.

By following these steps and providing accurate information, you can increase your chances of successfully getting your Binance account verified, thereby unlocking the full potential of the platform while enjoying enhanced security features.

Introduction To Buying Instagram Accounts Buying Instagram accounts has become a common practice for many businesses and influencers. Understanding The Purpose And Popularity Of Purchasing Instagram Accounts Why buy Instagram accounts? Many buyers want instant access to a large follower base. This can boost brand visibility and social proof quickly. • Businesses use these accounts to promote products faster. • Influencers want to jumpstart their social presence. • Marketers seek accounts with active engagement for campaigns. The popularity of buying accounts grows because creating a popular Instagram profile takes months or years. Buying an account can give a head start in competitive markets. Engagement Metrics: Why Followers And Interaction Matter Followers count shows an account’s reach. But numbers alone do not tell the full story. Interaction is equally important. Likes, comments, and shares reveal how active and interested the audience is. • High follower count with low interaction may indicate fake followers. • Consistent engagement shows a loyal and real audience. • Look for accounts with at least 3-5% engagement rate for good activity. Tracking metrics helps predict future growth and success. Account Age And Authenticity: Indicators Of Trustworthiness Older accounts tend to be more trustworthy. Instagram values accounts with a long history. New accounts might have fake followers or be flagged for spam. Feature Why It Matters Account Age Shows stability and trust from Instagram Profile Authenticity Real photos, consistent posts, and genuine bio Follower Quality Active and real followers signal trust Check for signs of authenticity to avoid scams or fake accounts. Niche Relevance: Ensuring Alignment With Your Brand Or Goals Matching the account’s niche with your brand is vital. Relevant content attracts the right audience. This leads to better engagement and growth.
  6. Identify your target audience and goals.
  7. Choose accounts with posts in the same niche or industry.
  8. Verify that followers share similar interests. Proper niche alignment saves time and boosts marketing efforts. How To Verify The Authenticity Of An Instagram Account Verifying the authenticity of an Instagram account is essential before any purchase. It ensures the account is genuine and valuable. Authentic accounts build trust and have real engagement. Fake or inactive accounts waste your investment. Follow simple steps to confirm the account’s true nature. Checking For Genuine Followers And Avoiding Fake Accounts Start by examining the followers. Genuine followers have real profiles with photos and activity. Fake followers often have: • No profile picture or generic images • Few or no posts • Random usernames with numbers or symbols • Low or no engagement on their posts Look for a balanced ratio between followers and following. A huge follower count with low engagement signals fake followers. Use free tools or manual checks to spot suspicious accounts. Reviewing Account History And Content Consistency Review the account’s post history carefully. Authentic accounts usually have: • Regular posting over months or years • Consistent style, theme, or niche • Engagement like comments and likes from real users • Natural growth in followers, not sudden spikes Check for deleted posts or gaps in activity. Sudden changes may indicate account flipping or fake activity. Authentic accounts show steady development and genuine interaction. Pricing And Affordability Breakdown For Instagram Accounts Buying an Instagram account requires understanding the price factors and how costs vary. Prices differ widely based on several key elements. This section explains what affects pricing and compares rates across account types. It helps you find the best value without overspending. Factors Influencing Account Pricing Several important factors shape the cost of Instagram accounts: • Followers count: More followers usually mean higher prices. • Engagement rate: Active likes and comments increase account value. • Account age: Older accounts often cost more due to trust and stability. • Niche relevance: Popular niches like fashion or fitness can raise prices. • Verification status: Verified accounts have premium pricing. • Geographic audience: Accounts with followers from specific regions may affect price. • Content quality: Well-curated accounts with original posts are priced higher. Comparing Market Rates For Different Account Types Instagram accounts fall into categories based on follower size and niche. Prices vary accordingly. The following table shows typical market rates: Account Type Followers Range Price Range (USD) Notes Micro 1,000 – 10,000 $50 – $300 Good for niche marketing, higher engagement Mid-tier 10,000 – 100,000 $300 – $2,000 Balance of reach and engagement Macro 100,000 – 1 Million $2,000 – $10,000 Strong influence, suitable for brands Celebrity/Verified Varies $10,000+ Exclusive, very high value Prices may fluctuate based on engagement and niche demand. Micro accounts offer affordability and targeted audiences. Macro accounts provide broad exposure but cost more. Verified accounts stand out with premium pricing due to trust and authenticity. Pros And Cons Of Buying Instagram Accounts Buying Instagram accounts is a popular option for fast social media growth. It offers a shortcut to access an existing audience. Yet, this choice also carries risks and challenges. Understanding the benefits and drawbacks helps make a smart decision. Advantages: Fast Growth And Established Audience Buying Instagram accounts gives instant access to followers. This saves time compared to building an account from zero. Disadvantages: Potential Risks And Account Bans Buying accounts can lead to risks that harm your efforts. Instagram may detect suspicious activity. This can result in account restrictions or bans. Account bans Instagram can suspend or delete accounts without warning. Loss of control Previous owners may have access or leave hidden issues. Due diligence is critical. Verify account authenticity before purchase. Monitor account activity closely after buying to avoid surprises. Safe Practices For Purchasing Instagram Accounts Buying Instagram accounts requires caution to avoid scams and loss. Follow safe practices to protect your investment and personal data. Trustworthy sources and secure transfer methods are key. Careful steps ensure you get a genuine account without issues. Using Trusted Marketplaces And Escrow Services Choose trusted marketplaces to buy Instagram accounts. These platforms verify sellers and offer buyer protection. They reduce risks of fake or banned accounts. • Check reviews of the marketplace before buying. • Look for clear policies on refunds and disputes. • Use marketplaces with escrow services to hold funds safely. • Escrow releases money only after account transfer is confirmed. This process helps avoid scams and ensures fair trade for both parties. Steps To Securely Transfer And Protect Your Account Follow these steps to secure the Instagram account after purchase:
  9. Change login details: Update the email, phone number, and password immediately.

Specific Recommendations For Ideal Buyers Buying Instagram accounts can be a smart move for certain buyers. It saves time and effort building followers from zero. However, not everyone benefits equally. Understanding who should buy and when helps make better choices. Who Should Consider Buying Instagram Accounts Businesses and Entrepreneurs aiming to boost social presence quickly can find value. A ready account with followers helps start promotions fast. Influencers wanting to jumpstart their reach may benefit. It provides a head start on audience building. Marketers and Agencies managing multiple campaigns often seek established accounts. Post-purchase Tips To Maximize Your Instagram Account Value Buying an Instagram account is just the first step. To get the best value, you must work on the account carefully. item.title: 유튜브 보다가 갑자기 앱 만들기 - One Page Today
item.content:encoded:
그냥저냥 유튜브를 보다가 뜬 AI 해커톤 공고

보고 나서 그냥 갑자기 추진력이 생겨버렸다. 이유는 딱히 없다. 일중독인가?

아무튼 해커톤 공고를 처음 봤을 때 주제가 폭이 아주 넓었다.

OpenAI API를 활용한 비즈니스 가치가 있는 프로덕트

그걸 바이브 코딩을 이용해서 빠르게 제작하는 해커톤이며, 단순 데모보다 실제로 작동하고 수익이 될 수 있는 것을 권장한다.

마침 내가 요즘 취미로 바이브코딩을 하고 있지 않나!

그래서 평소에 생각하던 아이디어 하나를 황급히 꺼냈다.

아무것도 쓰지 않아도 하루가 일기로 남는 서비스.

문제

일기를 쓰고 싶긴 한데 쓰기 싫다.

이게 사실 모순이 아니다. 기록하고 싶은 마음은 있는데, 그걸 글로 풀어내는 행위 자체가 부담인 것이다. 블로그 글도 생각은 쉬운데 쓰는 게 진짜 귀찮은 것처럼

그래서 대부분은 그냥 흘려보낸다. 오늘도 뭔가 있었는데, 내일만 되더라도 기억이 잘 안 난다.

아이디어

스마트폰은 이미 하루를 다 알고 있다.

메시지를 언제 보냈는지, 사진을 몇 시에 찍었는지, 어디로 이동했는지.

이걸 직접적으로 쓰게 하지 않고, 그냥 수집해서 일기로 만들면 어떨까 싶었다.

핵심은 해석하지 않는다는 거다.

"오늘 힘들어 보였다"거나 "좋은 하루였다"는 식의 감정 분석 없이,
시간, 이동, 리듬만 보고 담백하게 정리한다.

위로나 조언 없이, 공유 전제도 없이. 그냥 오늘을 그냥 흘려보내지 않았다는 감각 하나만.

보안 이슈가 있을 수 있는데, 일기 생성에 쓰인 원본 데이터는 처리 즉시 삭제한다.

나름 공인 방식이다

One Page Today

매일 저녁 하루를 한 페이지로 정리해서 푸시 알림으로 보내준다. 기본은 10시로 픽스해뒀는데, 수정도 가능하다.

사용자는 그저 일기를 읽기만 하면 끝난다.

앱은 Android 내부 테스트 버전으로 배포 중이다.
테스트해보고 싶으면 아래로.

데모 영상: YouTube
문의/비공개 테스트 참여: yujinhong3@gmail.com 해커톤 아이디어 링크: https://hack.primer.kr/rounds/8/ideas/926

해커톤 아이디어 링크에서 좋아요도 눌러주면 매우 큰 감사

02.20(금) 23:59까지 접수 중이니 관심 있다면 참가해봐도 좋다. 이틀 안에 구현하기는 웹사이트 간단하게 쌀먹하는 느낌일 것 같지만.

What Is a Facebook Account?

A Facebook account is a personal or business profile on the Facebook platform that allows users to connect with others, share content, and access features like Facebook Marketplace, Groups, and Ads Manager. When we talk about buying Facebook accounts, we’re usually referring to aged or pre-verified accounts that are ready to use for specific purposes like advertising or selling on Marketplace.

Key Features of Facebook Accounts

Here’s what makes Facebook accounts valuable:

  • Age: Older accounts (aged accounts) are more trusted by Facebook’s algorithms.

  • Activity: Many accounts have a history of posts, likes, and interactions, which adds to their credibility.

  • Verification: Verified with real email addresses and phone numbers for added security.

  • Marketplace Access: Some accounts come with immediate access to Facebook Marketplace.

  • Advertising Readiness: These accounts are ready to run ad campaigns without the delays or restrictions often faced by new accounts.

Why Are Facebook Accounts Important?

If you’ve ever tried to use a new Facebook account for ads or business purposes, you’ve probably faced challenges like ad rejections, restricted features, or even account bans. Buying Facebook accounts solves these problems and offers several key benefits:
